data.title: Leonard Thompson (1819-1901)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Leonard Thompson born 1819 Busti, Busti, Chautauqua, New York, United States died 1901 Greenfield, Sauk, Wisconsin, United States including ancestors + descendants + 1 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 6 May 2022 | Created 19 Feb 2022

This page has been accessed 107 times.

Biography

Leonard was born in 1819. He passed away in 1901. His first child Leonard died as an infant...in Ohio I have docs-deeds, pictures, a long narrative printed when family honored him on his 70th birthday.

In the 1850 census Leonard (age 30) was in Brooklyn, Sauk, Wisconsin, United States.[1]

In the 1860 census L (age 40) was in Greenfield, Sauk, Wisconsin, United States.[2]

Name Sex Age Occupation Birth Place L Thompson M 40 Farmer New York Almira Thompson F 42 Ohio J S Thompson M 19 Farmer Ohio Carlos Thompson M 11 Wisconsin Augusta Thompson F 7 Wisconsin Erastus Thompson M 2 Wisconsin H Wicks F 17 Domestic New York

Death certificate says he was born in Canadaigna, Ontario, New York

family notes say there was a brother Joseph Thompson who married Hester Kenyon. Also a sister Lucinda. Can't find anything on either. He married 2 x. First wife Almira Crawford- with whom he had his children 2nd wife was Mattie Springer who helped raise raise the children. Have obit, land docs, extensive notes on remarks on his 90th birthday, etc.
